description:
Midge and the others are trying to leave the garbage field, but the Stork can`t move. Doc discovers that a critical wire has been chewed through, and a remaining electricity eating bug has managed to get on board the ship. Once the electricity eating bug is taken care of, Ellen and Wang get their first taste of takoyaki to celebrate, but celebrations are cut short when yet another mysterious robot makes its way on board.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Denkuimushi Gekitai Sakusen / Kikaijikake no Seisouin
Strategy to Repel the Electricity Eating Bugs / Mechanized Janitor
電クイ虫撃退作戦 / 機械仕掛けの清掃員
